title: Add JSON-LD Schema Markup
reason: Schema markup can improve SEO by helping search engines understand content more effectively, which can improve search visibility.
code: <script type='application/ld+json'> { '@context': 'https://schema.org', '@type': 'Product', 'name': '17-Inch Axie the Axolotl', 'description': 'Super soft plush material 17 inches tall Suitable for all ages Machine washable', 'image': 'axolotl.jpg', 'offers': { '@type': 'Offer', 'priceCurrency': 'USD', 'price': '29.99' } } </script>

title: Add Lang Attribute
reason: The lang attribute helps search engines understand the language of the page content, which can improve search visibility and accessibility.

title: Add Alt Text for Related Products
reason: Alt text improves accessibility for visually impaired users and boosts SEO by providing more context to search engines.
code: alt='Blue Axolotl Plush for $24.99', alt='Mini Axolotl Plush for $14.99', alt='Axolotl Keychain for $9.99'
location: Replace existing alt attributes in related-products section

title: Structured Review Markup
reason: Structured data for reviews can significantly improve product's visibility in search results.
